Title: Anatomy
Plot: As we come in, Steve invites us to try out his stethoscope and listen to Blue's heartbeat. In this episode, we learn all about different parts of the body. We check out a computer program and learn about the mouth, the eyes and the ears. Steve shows off his muscles when helping Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper. In the Blue Skiddoo segment, we experiment with a special type of x-ray machine.
GuestStars: Jessica A. Peterson, Sean McKeegan, Eric Marcus, Christina Franklin, Lauren Edgerton, Cortney Mancuso, Michael A. Robinson, Addison Baio
